Entries.Resort: The mushrooms around here are extraordinary!$h#$b#I have never seen any mushrooms like these!$h

Entries.Demetrius: Rare to see winter storms around here....Something in the weather seems different.

Entries.ScienceHouse_22_20: I've got so much data I need to analyze.$s
Entries.fallScienceHouse_22_20: I'd love to talk, @, but I have a grant submission coming up that I need to work on.
Entries.summerScienceHouse_22_20: I have so many measurements I need to make today...$s
Entries.fallMountain_45_8: We're lucky to have so much old growth forest around here.#$b#It takes decades for a forest to develop properly.
Entries.summer_2{{YearRemainder}}: I better not forget our anniversary this year, Robin will really hate it if I forget again.

Entries.6_2: I hope my collaborator can get his edits in soon....$s
Entries.16_2: It's always reviewer two, isn't it? Always.$a
Entries.18_2: Gotta order more reagents soon, we're running low on HCl.
Entries.ScienceHouse_22_20: I'm so sorry, @, I've got so much work I need to get done before next Monday.
Entries.summerScienceHouse_22_20: Just need to gather a little more data for a proposal.
Entries.fallScienceHouse_22_20: Sometimes I feel like I spend more time writing proposals than anything else.$s
Entries.winterScienceHouse_22_20: Sorry, @, I've got a talk I need to prepare for.
Entries.fallMountain_45_8: Some of these trees are more than a hundred years old. I hope you weren't planning on cutting them down.

Entries.fall_1_2: Now that it's fall, I think I'll try growing some pumpkins for Robin again.%revealtasteRobin276#$b#They're her favorite vegetable. Here, I have a few extra seeds, want them? [490]#$e#Tried growing them a few years ago, I'm not the best gardener. Think I over-watered them.
Entries.6_2: Did you see that paper by the %name group out of %place University? Amazing, isn't it?$h
Entries.16_2: Sometimes I wonder what I could have done to be more successful in my career...$s
Entries.18_2: Between you and I, @, writing proposals is the worst part of my job.
Entries.20_2: Tree fertilizer can make trees grow much faster, but I wonder if it affects the quality of their wood.#$b#Generally fast-growing trees can't produce as dense of wood.
Entries.summerScienceHouse_22_20: It's been so hot lately, I suspect the trees are stressed.
Entries.fallScienceHouse_22_20: Got a conference coming up, @, hoping I can get myself a talk.
Entries.winterScienceHouse_22_20: My collaborator claims his equipment is broken again.#$b#We're far closer to the submission deadline for this paper than I'd like...
Entries.fallMountain_45_8: Funding has been a lot tighter this year than it was last year.#$b#I didn't even get my inflation adjustment. I'm making less actual money this year than last.$s

Entries.2_2: Before Pelican Town was a mining town, it was a forestry.#$b#But that was a long time ago, and the forest has had a bit of a chance to recover.
Entries.18_4: @, did you know that the oldest mushrooms are more than two thousand years old?
